name: The Perfect Unit
description: The Perfect Unit is a puzzle. On each level you need to arrange items around the room in the correct order to bring the robot to the exit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 2048 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
